text: Teuma taseuboe taba peurintah Bek tameudawa ngon ahli kitab Meu kon beugot-got bak jih tapeugah Meulengkan jihnyan keubit that lalem Han sapeue jitem ‘oh tapeurintah Takheun di kamoe bandum meuiman Peue nyang Neupeutron sideh le Allah Neupéutron ubak kamoe ngon gata Tuhan nyang esa nyang bri peurintah Nyan Tuhan kamoe ngon Tuhan gata Allah Taʻala nyang Maha Murah Kamoe meujok droe keunan bak gata Kamoe Iseulam hana meuilah
